|brand = Embest Technology |model = SBC-EC9100 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = REV 02 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = February 2, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/RIoTboard |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6ULL;MCIMX6G3DVM05AA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 528<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GLDEA-0M WT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MTFC4GLDEA-0M WT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ8081; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.04; |stockos = Linux;3.14.52;Debian 8.4;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, MIPI CSI, CAN Bus, RS485, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO |addchip = PMIC for i.MX6UL;NXP;MC34PF3001A7EP;;1;,,, High-Speed CAN Transceiver;NXP;MC33901;;2;,,, 256Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;ON Semi;CAT24C256;;1;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Sipex;SP2526A;;1;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;TI;TPS3808;;1;,,, Full-Duplex RS485/RS-422 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM3485;;1;,,, Low-Voltage I/O Touch Screen Controller;Burr-Brown;TSC2046;;1;,,, Very Low Capacitance ESD Protection;STMicro;USBLC6-2;;2;,,, Low Capacitance TVS Diode Array;Semtech;SRV05-4;;2;,,, 4-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3257;;1;,,, 12V, 12A Single P-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMA908PZ;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = debian |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2016 |estprice = 30 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BHQMZGS2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "SBC-EC9100 REV02" and "2016-6-2" is on top of board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' i.MX6ULL @528MHz :MCIMX6G3DVM05AA â€¢ ARM (Cortex-A7) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Storage: 4GB eMMC Flash *Network: 1x FE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) ports *GPIO: 2x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 5V/2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/EMTOP-TECH/SBC-EC9100/tree/main ''SBC-EC9100'' on '''GitHub''']
